subject: Suspicious Phishing Email - Reporting
body:
Dear Security Team,

I received a suspicious email claiming to be from your bank asking me to "verify my account" by clicking a link and entering my credentials. The email looked somewhat legitimate but had several red flags:

1. Generic greeting ("Dear Customer" instead of my name)
2. Urgent tone threatening account closure
3. Suspicious sender email: support@bank-security-verify.com
4. Link going to a non-bank website

I did NOT click the link or provide any information. I am forwarding this email to you so your security team can investigate and warn other customers.

My Account Number: ACC-2020-5566

Please confirm this was not a legitimate email from your bank.

Thank you,
Thomas Anderson
